name: Magic Frontier
description:
Magic Frontier is a puzzle game where you must go deeper and deeper through the wilderness to reconnect with the world's magic. You'll need to manage your resources well in order to ensure success.

Controls
  • WASD/Arrow keys: Pan camera
  • Left mouse button: Select and place buildings
  • Right mouse button: Destroy buildings
How To Play

(Instructions are available in-game at all times)

  • Villages collect resources from forest tiles
  • Towers expand the radius in which you can place buildings
  • Barracks destroy goblin camps, allowing buildings to be built on goblin land
